resources.string: Our application allows users to apply for jobs by submitting their resume and an introductory video to potential employers

XYZ Inc. is a leading technology company that specializes in developing innovative software solutions for businesses across various industries. The company was founded in 2005 by a group of software engineers who wanted to make a difference in the world of technology. Today, XYZ Inc. is a well-established organization with a team of over 500 employees and offices located in several countries around the world.
We are looking for an experienced Android Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing native Android applications using Java and Kotlin.
